sentence:
634c) is amended--

(1) in paragraph (5), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in paragraph (6), by striking the period at the end and       inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following:

``(7) represent the views and interests of small businesses       before foreign governments and international entities for the       purpose of contributing to regulatory and trade initiatives       which may affect small businesses.''.
title: Small Business Advocacy Improvements Act of 2025

sentence:
5305(a)) is       amended--

(A) in paragraph (25)(D), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(B) in paragraph (26), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(C) by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

``(27) the new construction of affordable housing, within       the meaning given such term under section 215 of the       Cranston-Gonzalez National Affordable Housing Act (42 U.S.C.
title: Housing for the 21st Century Act

sentence:
74(b)) is amended--

(1) in paragraph (2), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in paragraph (3)(F), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following:

``(4) that the Secretary shall prioritize the adoption of       improved grain grading technology to provide for efficient,       accurate, and consistent grading of grain.''.
title: United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025

sentence:
1395jjj(c)(1)) is amended--

(1) in subparagraph (A), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in subparagraph (B), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

``(C) in the case of performance years beginning on or       after January 1, 2026, primary care services provided under       this title by an ACO professional described in subsection       (h)(1)(B).''.
title: Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions

sentence:
1235(f)) is amended--

(1) by striking the ``and'' after the semicolon in       paragraph (6);

(2) by striking the period at the end of paragraph (7) and       inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by inserting at the end the following:

``(8) a list of projects proposed under subsection (n).''.
title: Community Reclamation Partnerships Act of 2025
